example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Gardner then disconnected the A-frame carriage mount from the bay floor and mated it tothe ring on the base of the satellite.

example.name: passivized arg0
example.text: In the experiment, [mice with the defective gene]-1 were mated [*-1].

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: He took one pigeon with a certain peculiarity, say a full breast, and mated It to another pigeon with a full breast.
example.arg: breast, and mated It to another pigeon

example.name: ARG1
example.text: The company producing the supersalmon says it can solve that problem by engineering fish that never mate , but the balance of nature grows more complicated and controversial , the deeper man explores the power of creation .
